Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

    ValidURLValidator

    XMLFragmentMIWTValidator

Package net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation Description

This package contains classes related to component validation. Validation provides a means to ensure that data entered into a component is valid. Validation may include limiting a Field to a valid numerical value, a North American phone number convention, etc. Use the ComponentImpl.setValidator(Validator) method to set the validator for a component.

The medium layer may provide a level of validation based on the standard validation classes. If you extend a validator do not make it less restrictive than the base class. The ValidatorUtil class may also be used to get a list of failed components in a component tree.
